name: The First Skunk Bundle
overview: The 5 included games: Zombie Epic: An action-packed zombie survival game with a story and survival mode. Snake Classic: Just like the traditional Snake game. Your goal is to grow your snake as long as you can by consuming dots. Be sure to avoid the wall and your own tail. Bomb Blaster: A casual game where you strategically place bombs. Over 30 fun and challenging levels that will test your skill. Catchy: A 3D puzzle adventure game. Over 50 heart pounding levels for you to carefully navigate. Haunted Hotel: A first person horror game spoof. Your goal is to get to the roof.
